feed.title: AutoKitteh Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: remove unused session history storage by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1168
  • fix(salesforce): ignore self-triggering events by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1170
  • chore(go): Update to go 1.24.1 and bump dependencies by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1163
  • bug(python): Don't run AttrDict methods as activities by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1173
  • chore(sessions): remove deprecated code by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1172

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.1...v0.15.2

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(python): Don't print in Start (race) by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1176
  • refactor(integration): common HTTP request logic by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1167
  • fix(salesforce): robust gRPC retries by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1175
  • feat: Add Zoom event handler by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1169
  • feat: add exponential backoff to Subscribe method in Salesforce gRPC by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1178
  • chore: update web-platform version to: 2.167.1 by @RonenMars in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1181
  • fix: validate service account drive credentials before use by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1182
  • feat: add a default oauth option for salesforce + bug fixes by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1184

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.2...v0.15.3

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(sessions): properly return history events when doing descending filter by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1171
  • feat: Add Zoom connTest function by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1157

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.3...v0.15.4

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: don't run crons in test mode by @efiShtain in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1188
  • fix: Update GoReleaser Configuration to Version 2 by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1185
  • bug(python): Split Execute so it won't hang activities. by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1180
  • chore(deps): bump github.com/containerd/containerd from 1.7.26 to 1.7.27 by @dependabot in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1190
  • fix(python): do not use print in error formatter by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1191
  • fix: Add test helpers by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1186
  • fix: improve timestamp parsing by @daabr in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1151
  • feat(sessions): speed up prints by @itayd in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1174
  • chore(python): Session test for import error by @tebeka in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1179

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.4...v0.15.5

entry.title: New release for AutoKitteh: v0.15.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Add linear connTest function by @mario99logic in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1193
  • fix(salesforce): reinitialize grpc client after errors by @pashafateev in https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/pull/1199

Full Changelog: https://github.com/autokitteh/autokitteh/compare/v0.15.5...v0.15.6
